rooms.description: A spacious entry with Vastu compliant positioning and wheelchair accessible features including ramps, tactile floor indicators.
Large open space with Bohemian decor, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for ample natural light, arranged in a central courtyard view.
Semi-open dining area adjoining the living room with access to the central courtyard for outdoor dining and socializing.
Modern kitchen with ergonomic design and easy-access cabinetry for wheelchair users, ensuring compliance with local building codes and Vastu principles for functional space placement.
Service area including laundry and storage, positioned conveniently near the kitchen.
Corridor connecting main living areas with servant's quarters, ensuring accessibility for wheelchair users with wide pathways.

openings.description: Open courtyard serving as a communal and private relaxation space, designed to maximize natural ventilation and sunlight according to Vastu principles.
